item.description: This is particularly for the many musicians we have in our group -- Bring a guitar, a bass, drums, voice, whatever instrument you like. I'd love to get all of you who are interested in finding other musicians together (including me). I'll provide drinks, nibbles and a space to play. If you don't play or sing and want to come, you're also welcome.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Jam Session with Drinks & Nibbles at Victoria's
